Mobile



The projects are related to Android applications. My major skills include Java, Android programming, Android Wearable programming.

1. Bisecu, smart bike lock app



Description

This project was motivated to develop a smart bike lock application for Android. To acheive this goal, Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) was used to receive signal from IoT device, smart bike lock. The applcation was able to not only control IoT devices but also keep track of activity tracking.

The application was introduced in MWC 2017 and presented in big media, including NBC News, AP news and Reuter. To see details, please refer to the paper in 'Related Articles' below.


Skills

Java
Android
Google Material Design


Period

5 months

  • 31 Jul
    2016

  • 1 Mar
    2017

Related Articles

2. Coding Starter, coding education app


Description

The goal of this project was to provide free coding education contents. To acheive this goal, the user interface was designed to be easy to study on the mobile environment with one finger such as tapping blocks.

The accumulative download has been reached 3000+ and the average rating scores 3.9. To see details, please refer to the paper in 'Related Articles' below. The applciation is not supported by Google Play Store (2021).


Skills

Java
MongoDB
Heroku
Android


Period

1+ years

  • 1 Jan
    2017

  • Present
    2017

Related Articles

3. Automatic Table Tennis Scoring App


Description

The goal of this project was motivated to develop an automatic table tennis application for Android phone and Android wearable devices. To acheive this goal, Android phone processed sensor data from Android wearable and FFT algorithm to extract ball sound.



Skills

Java
FFT
Android
Android Wearable
Google Material Design


Period

5 months

  • 1 Mar
    2017

  • 1 June
    2018

Related Articles

  • [Patent] Korea Patent 10-2019-0033604, Nov 11, 2020
